overview: As the CTO, Michael Dalton is responsible for long-term direction and research to ensure the security, scalability, and performance of the Zettaset platform. Michael completed his Ph.D. in Computer Science at Stanford University under Professor Christos Kozyrakis. While at Stanford, Michael published numerous scientific papers on computer security, computer architecture, and other topics in top academic conferences such as USENIX Security and the International Symposium on Computer Architecture.
